mapper.select: SELECT a.*, e.EMPLOYEE_NM, c.COMMON_NM, e.EMPLOYEE_HD, a.EMPLOYEE_CD, CASE WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(e.EMPLOYEE_HD, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) / 12) < 1 THEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(e.EMPLOYEE_HD, 'yyyy-MM-dd')))) || '개월' ELSE TO_CHAR(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(e.EMPLOYEE_HD, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) / 12)) || '년' END AS SERVICE_YEARS, c.COMMON_NM AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, CASE WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(e.EMPLOYEE_HD, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) / 12) < 1 THEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(e.EMPLOYEE_HD, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))) + NVL(a.ANNUAL_RA, 0) WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(e.EMPLOYEE_HD, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) / 12) < 3 THEN 15 + NVL(a.ANNUAL_RA, 0) ELSE LEAST(15 + FLOOR((FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(e.EMPLOYEE_HD, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) / 12) - 3) / 2), 25) + NVL(a.ANNUAL_RA, 0) END AS EXPECT_ANNUAL FROM ANNUAL a LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMPLOYEE_CD = e.EMPLOYEE_CD LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON e.EMPLOYEE_DP = c.COMMON_CC WHERE 1=1 AND c.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' AND EMPLOYEE_US = '1' ORDER BY a.ANNUAL_YR DESC, a.EMPLOYEE_CD DESC

SELECT e.*, c.* FROM EMPLOYEE e LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON e.EMPLOYEE_DP = c.COMMON_CC AND c.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' WHERE 1=1 AND e.EMPLOYEE_NM LIKE '%' || #{employee_nm} || '%' ORDER BY e.EMPLOYEE_CD DESC

SELECT e.EMPLOYEE_NM , a.APPROVAL_CD , c.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_DP , cc.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_GD , a.APPROVAL_WR , a.APPROVAL_DV , a.APPROVAL_AV , JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') AS annualtype , JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.startday') AS startday , JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.endday') AS endday , CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') = 'AN' THEN 1 WHEN JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') = 'BN' THEN 0.5 ELSE 0 -- 병가 END AS mapped_value , CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') = 'AN' AND JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.startday') <> JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.endday') THEN TO_DATE(JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.endday'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.startday'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 ELSE 0 END AS day_difference -- startday와 endday 간 차이 계산 (연차 갯수 계산) FROM APPROVAL a LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON e.EMPLOYEE_CD = a.APPROVAL_WR LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON c.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' AND c.COMMON_CC = e.EMPLOYEE_DP LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE cc ON cc.COMMON_GC = 'POSITION' AND cc.COMMON_CC = e.EMPLOYEE_GD WHERE 1=1 AND a.APPROVAL_DV = '10' AND a.APPROVAL_AV = '5' AND e.EMPLOYEE_CD = ${employee_cd}

WITH DATE_RANGE AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.startday'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STARTDAY, TO_DATE(JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.endday'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENDDAY, a.APPROVAL_CT, a.APPROVAL_DV, JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') AS ANNUAL_TYPE FROM APPROVAL a WHERE a.APPROVAL_DV = '10' AND JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.startday') IS NOT NULL AND JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.endday') IS NOT NULL AND ( JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.startday') <> JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.endday') OR JSON_VALUE(a.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') = 'BN' ) ), DATES AS ( SELECT DR.STARTDAY, DR.ENDDAY, DR.APPROVAL_CT, DR.APPROVAL_DV, DR.ANNUAL_TYPE, DR.STARTDAY + (LEVEL - 1) AS GENERATED_DATE FROM DATE_RANGE DR CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (CASE WHEN DR.STARTDAY <> DR.ENDDAY THEN (DR.ENDDAY - DR.STARTDAY) + 1 ELSE 1 END) AND PRIOR DR.STARTDAY = DR.STARTDAY AND PRIOR SYS_GUID() IS NOT NULL ) SELECT TO_CHAR(D.GENERATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GENERATED_DATE, COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT, LISTAGG(JSON_VALUE(D.APPROVAL_CT, '$.reason'), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY D.GENERATED_DATE) AS REASONS, JSON_VALUE(D.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') AS ANNUALTYPE FROM DATES D WHERE D.GENERATED_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-12-29', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2025-02-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(D.GENERATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), JSON_VALUE(D.APPROVAL_CT, '$.annualtype') ORDER BY GENERATED_DATE
